item.description:
*Prana Free Speaker Series*

Eating Raw Foods on the East Coast and Loving It!

Join Brandi Rollins, author of "Confessions of an East Coast Raw Vegan" and the upcoming book "Raw Foods on a Budget," for a FREE SEMINAR.

Brandi will Discuss:
1. The beneﬁts of eating raw foods on the northern east coast.
2. How to thrive on raw foods all year long, even in the winter!
3. How to eat raw foods while living on a budget.
http://www.rawfoodsonabudget.com/

Opening music for this event will be performed by GaBrilla Ballard! This New Orleans born and bred Singer-songwriter weaves jazz and soul inspired melodies with rich lyrical content into what she describes as "soul roots" music. For more information visit, www.urbanmamasong.com.

Join the PRANA Family for this *FREE* and life-changing seminar.
Email emily@eatatprana.com to RSVP.

*Please note: you will be able to purchase dinner at the restaurant during the event.

Please bring a yoga mat or cushion as seating.

Feel free to print name tag & carpool.
http://www.meetup.com/RawBoston/grow/nametag
item.how_to_find_us: Feel free to print name tag & carpool. www.meetup.com/RawBoston/grow/nametags
item.name: FREE Talk at PRANA: Brandi Rollins
